title: Practitioner Online Professional Development Through Large-Scale Blended Learning Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and practical experience in the field
context.additional_context: Requires strengthening competencies in designing and operating blended learning programs in response to accelerated digital transformation post-COVID-19

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply the principles of large-scale blended learning program design in practice
Learners can design teaching methods using LMS-based asynchronous learning environments and online collaboration tools
Learners can establish practical strategies to improve educational effectiveness through learner data analysis
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
